1210 🇺🇲 posted 2 days ago by Looniz74 PRO 41 comments award share report block Steak 'n Shake @SteaknShake • 2d Proud to raise the American flag at our Mattoon, Illinois location. We thank you for your continued patronage!

He is also the chairman and CEO of Steak 'n Shake. Biglari is the founder, chairman and CEO of Biglari Capital, the general partner to The Lion Fund. Wikipedia
Born: 1977 (age 48 years), Tehran, Iran permalink award report block reply anotherthing 2 points 1 day ago I'm not sure that many people know that the CEO of Steak n Shake's an Iranian immigrant. Of course, given that this guy does things like this and also smacked down the CEO of Cracker Barrel over the retarded rebrand she was doing, he seems like a based immigrant. permalink parent award report block reply chadthunder 2 points 2 days ago The Steak n Shake near my house closed in the last couple of years.  It was horribly managed, always dirty and woefully understaffed.  Too bad.  Their burgers are delicious, but I just couldn’t go there anymore permalink award report block reply L-Train 2 points 2 days ago 😳🤯Who are you and where do you live?! You wrote my experience with Steak and Shake exactly here in Vincennes. I miss the "Happy Hour " half priced shakes from 2-5 the most, Cotton Candy shakes. 😭 It was like liquid Crack in the hot summer's. permalink parent award report block reply Givesgunstogrannies 2 points 2 days ago Been our new favorite restaurant lately.  Tallow fries and if you buy the "bitcoin" burger, you get $5 in CIA controlled cryptocurrency.  The also sell jars of tallow. permalink award report block reply Mungo 2 points 2 days ago Wish I was near one. permalink award report block reply BetterNameUnfound 2 points 2 days ago I finally got a chance to eat at one of these recently. Absolutely delicious. You need to try it at least once. Weird that you need to scan a receipt QR code to get your drink and get refills...but the food was great. permalink award report block reply L-Train 1 points 2 days ago Wendy's just dropped to #2 permalink award report block reply Samsons_Mullet 1 points 1 day ago I’m want a Steak and Shake near me but this town has too many fast food places as it is. permalink award report block reply MasterChief 1 points 2 days ago they only started doing this when they were on the verge of bankruptcy, this is desperation not patriotism permalink award report block reply anotherthing 1 points 1 day ago The CEO of Steak n Shake was also very publicly critical of the Cracker Barrel rebrand before that picked up traction with the masses.
